title: 📘 Behind My Blog
paragraphs: I created this page to document every step I’ve taken in building the “Support My Journey” blog – a place where I share my dreams and hope to receive support from the community.

From learning how to set up a blog, customizing the layout, connecting PayPal, and creating a donation button... each step has been a meaningful experience. I wanted to keep track of it as a personal reminder and share it with anyone who might be walking a similar path.
milestones: July 5, 2025 – Came up with the idea to create a personal fundraising blog.
July 5, 2025 – Created the Blogspot site with the goal of raising funds to purchase equipment, searched for a suitable theme.
July 6, 2025 – Chose the blog name “Support My Journey”.
July 6, 2025 – Designed the logo and favicon in blue-white tones.
July 6, 2025 – Wrote the first fundraising campaign (Logitech G923).
July 6, 2025 – Registered PayPal and created the donation button.
July 7, 2025 – Integrated progress bar, donation history, and transparency policy.
July 8, 2025 – Purchased domain supportmyjourney.com and connected it to Blogspot. Configured DNS (Cloudflare) so Blogspot and Mail can function properly.
July 9, 2025 – Added multilingual support inside posts alongside Google Translate widget; optimized for mobile.
July 10, 2025 – Finalized multilingual system and removed Google Translate widget due to conflict with in-post system.
July 10, 2025 – Relax... I’ll continue updating with automatic donation tracking soon...
footer: Thank you for visiting this page. I hope this little journey gives you some insights or encouragement.
